meta.name: Space Invaders
meta.description: Aussie families are trapped in a clutter nightmare. Declutter guru Peter Walsh, renovation queen Cherie Barber, and treasure hunter Angie Kent transform people's homes and lives.

videos.title: Christmas Special
videos.overview: Aussie families are trapped in a clutter nightmare they're desperate to escape. Declutter guru Peter Walsh, renovation queen Cherie Barber and treasure hunter Angie Kent transform people's homes and lives.
